about_the_game:
Special Resources of Tuaroon continent, Mana Stone
Among the stones, Mana stones are a powerful source of ultimate energy.
But all the technicians who refined the stone were massacred.
Now the heroes are caught in an endless battle take over the refinery facility left behind.

Game Features

BattleRound is Fighting game, which is multiplayer based where teams of 2v2 or 5v5 fight each other for supremacy on a map.
Choose your character among the more than 30 of characters and join the Arena! Defeat the opposing team and kill they to win!

Easy for everyone!

It is not difficult at all. In 3 minutes anyone can learn most of BattleRound
BattleRound has a simple UI for the player to play the game,
Simple VR controller and Non-target skill use system, so anyone can easily adapt to the game.

Fast-paced!

You can use all the skills from the beginning, and a game's playtime is less than 5 minutes.
So very tense kind of matching will be on from the beginning.

Infinite Strategy

You can use a variety of skills and abilities without being restrained by their class and roles. Create unlimited strategies by using unexpected combinations of skills and equips!

Now, it’s time to join Arena!

Take the victory at BattleRound, enjoy the fast-paced creative team tactics that combines action-intensive, intuitive skills!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: Vive VR Headset required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
